header.style: color: rgb(255, 255, 255); width: 300px; height: 300px; position: static; background: none 0% 0% / auto repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgb(40, 44, 52); transform: none; display: flex; font-size: 28.74px; line-height: normal; flex-direction: column; align-items: center; justify-content: center; text-align: start; padding: 0px; margin: 0px; border-width: 0px 0px 5px; border-style: none none solid; border-color: rgb(255, 255, 255) rgb(255, 255, 255) rgb(97, 218, 251);
